Xydo

Korean: 시도

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Park Chi-woong
Native name:
박치웅
Birthday:
Jan 29, 1994
Age:
31 years old
Blood type:

Introduction

Park Chi-woong, widely known as Xydo, is an R&B South Korean singer who debuted under VIXX' Ravi's label GROOVL1N on August 14th, 2019.

He has been releasing and producing a lot of albums and songs for himself and some fellow idols' as well including Ravi's 'PARADISE' in which he participated in composition. Another is OnlyOneOf's "a sOng Of Ice & Fire", "libidO", "skinz" and a lot more. He also participated in the composition of NCT 127's "Skyscraper".

He also featured in a lot of songs including Ravi's "Still Nirvana" and "Limitless"

On May 9th, 2024 Xydo took to Instagram to announce that he has left the company Groovl1n, and for fans to stay tuned!
